title: John Fitzgerald Kennedy National Historic Site: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets       Pets are not allowed in the visitor center or historic home. Leashed pets are welcome in the backyard. Pets may not be left unattended; owners are responsible for removing pet waste.   Service animals Service animals are an exception to these rules and may accompany their owner to all park locations.  Â     Left: Modern dogs visit JFK's birthplace. Right: Jack stands with a family dog in Brookline Left: Nancy Anderson Right: John F. Kennedy Library Foundation
